ingredients.name: Earl Grey Tea (or other tea favorite)

title: Chia Pudding
description: Quick and easy high protein breakfast or light dessert.
directions: Make a strong cup of tea of your choice.
Add Chia seed to a glass bowl.
Pour in Tea and Milk and stir immediately.
Continue stirring and add maple syrup, almond or vanilla extract, and salt.
It should firm up fairly quickly.
